Important message from Senior Management Team

Dear colleagues and students,

Due to continued uncertainties in the transportation system and in light of the time needed to repair some of the damage to facilities across the campus, all classes will be suspended for the rest of the week (November 14 – 16, 2019).

Offices however will remain open.

Heads of departments and units can make special arrangements for colleagues who are not able to return to office or arrive on time because of transportation disruptions.

We will inform students and staff over the weekend regarding class and work arrangements for next week.

Senior Management Team
